resources.string: An extremely delicious burger. Wowza is this a spicy delicious food
A salad. Not much you can say because it is just a normal salad
This thanksgiving turkey is a bargain! It is really small though...
Look at this juicy T-bone steak. At this point I have no idea what kind of restaurant this is, but the food is pretty good
Wait no. This should not be here. Someone is definitely fired.
